trans-unit.source: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create a backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create a backup policy.

trans-unit.source: To add a StorSimple backup policy
trans-unit.target: To add a StorSimple backup policy

trans-unit.source: On the device **Quick Start** page, click the **Backup Policies** tab.
trans-unit.target: On the device **Quick Start** page, click the **Backup Policies** tab.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the **Backup Policies** page.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the **Backup Policies** page.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Add Backup Policy** dialog box, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the **Add Backup Policy** dialog box, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Specify a backup policy name that contains between 3 and 150 characters.
trans-unit.target: Specify a backup policy name that contains between 3 and 150 characters.

trans-unit.source: Assign one or more volumes to this backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Assign one or more volumes to this backup policy.

trans-unit.source: If you are using other cloud service providers, based on your first selection, the dropdown list will show volumes belonging to only that cloud service provider.
trans-unit.target: If you are using other cloud service providers, based on your first selection, the dropdown list will show volumes belonging to only that cloud service provider.

trans-unit.source: This will allow you to group volumes belonging to a single cloud service provider for taking a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: This will allow you to group volumes belonging to a single cloud service provider for taking a snapshot.

trans-unit.source: The newly added policy will be displayed in the tabular view on the **Backup Policies** page.
trans-unit.target: The newly added policy will be displayed in the tabular view on the **Backup Policies** page.
